name: Kuarup
description:
Kuarup is a puzzle game for Android devices in the "connect 3" style, where you can connect 2 or more pieces horizontally or vertically, even alternating the directions in the same path. Fulfill the rituals and save your tribe!

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2016, which theme was "Ritual", and development continued after the jam.

 GGJ entry: http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/kuarup
